articles.title: Moncton bails out curling club so it can pay bills, continue operating
articles.description: The City of Moncton is giving Curl Moncton a $66,000 bailout so the club can pay creditors and continue operating. The funds come with several conditions, including governance training and a new strategic plan.
articles.content:
The City of Moncton is giving Curl Moncton a $66,000 bailout so the club can pay its creditors and continue operating.
